mapper.insert: insert into daily_locations values ( default, #{itineraryId}, #{dayNumber}, #{startName}, #{startAddress}, #{startLat}, #{startLon}, #{endName}, #{endAddress}, #{endLat}, #{endLon}, now() )
mapper.select: select daily_location_id, itinerary_id, day_number, start_name, start_address, start_lat, start_lon, end_name, end_address, end_lat, end_lon, created_at from daily_locations where itinerary_id = #{itineraryId} order by day_number ASC

select daily_location_id, itinerary_id, day_number, start_name, start_address, start_lat, start_lon, end_name, end_address, end_lat, end_lon, created_at from daily_locations where itinerary_id = #{itineraryId} and day_number = #{dayNumber}
